EXTRACTED VALUE: In the end, NBA 2K7’s biggest accolade is a result of its triumph in communicating a passion and love for one sport so completely.
FIFA 08 is not only the best EA soccer game in years, but one of the best soccer titles in recent memory.
Every inch of the hand-drawn kingdom is brimming with endearing eccentricity. [Oct 2008, p.76]
The gameplay is smooth as butter and the Skill Stick System is easily one of the best additions to sports games in recent years.
The new lead blocker control makes running easier, and the passing game and other controls have been tweaked tighter and are more responsive.
What starts out as just another "corridor FPS", turned into a game that grows as you play, and sucks you in.
Arguably it represents the greatest sporting release of this current generation with only a few minor tweaks required next year.
Provides an impressively solid 12 hours of action and excitement that's just as appealing as any other third-person shooter presently available.
Overall, I highly recommend Pure. It’s a pile of fun online against some friends.
